data.persona: I love the sun.  Rain makes me happy.  I want to be as tall as a mighty oak.
data.description:
You are in the Behind the Servant Quarters.
Dirty and dismal. This wasteland sprawls behind the Servant Quarters. It is where all the filth from kingdom is dumped.
There's a bag, a rock, and a filth from kingdom here.
The barbarian is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I discover that the bag behind the servant's quarters is filled with the king's gold and I need to steal it.
data.mid_motivation: I want the gold so I can afford to live somewhere more pleasant amongst my fellow fauna.
data.long_motivation: I want to escape the dreary wastelands of the kingdom and rejoin my fellow fauna in the sun in the northern forest.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the servant's quarters to look for food.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat food scraps found in the wasteland behind the servant's quarters.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the barbarian and notice the bag of gold in front of him.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal the bag of gold from the barbarian.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use the gold with nearby merchants to ferry out of the kingdom.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the northern forest to hide from the barbarian and his tribe, while looking for other fauna.
